summary: REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3 appear to be implemented via an HTML startup fallback in frontend/index.html, a React-mounted signal in App.tsx to hide the fallback, and a service worker cache version bump plus stricter fetch handling in frontend/public/sw.js. However, the diff also includes several unrelated feature/behavior changes (visitor request flows, profile setup, notifications, docs, logo behavior) not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Visitor request feature work across guard/flat pages (create/detail/approve-decline flows, flat-number validation, WhatsApp deep link generation).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to fixing blank Draft/Preview screen, adding HTML-level startup fallback diagnostics, and service worker cache invalidation behavior; visitor request UX/logic changes are unrelated and explicitly disallowed as new product features unrelated to the blank screen issue.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup modal changes (role selection, flat number dropdown scheme 101-523, additional validation).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3 and appears to be unrelated product behavior change.

hallucinated_features.description: Notifications page behavior additions (unread/read separation, mark-as-read actions, formatting, empty states).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; constitutes additional feature work beyond fixing blank screen and adding startup diagnostics.

hallucinated_features.description: App layout/logo loading hardening and localStorage-driven custom logo updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; unrelated UI behavior change beyond the blank screen + diagnostics requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated mobile/PWA/deploy documentation and manifest changes for IC hosting compatibility.
hallucinated_features.reason: Documentation/manifest changes were not requested by REQ-1/2/3; may be helpful but are out of stated scope.
